(ship lands)Phobia scans the area and realizes somethings different. 
He doesn't know just how long he's been in space or what changes have 
been made to adapt to this planet so he decides it's ok to step 
outside and greet his benifactors.
Hello friends is anybody here?--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, 
Dachande85@a... wrote:
> ::Magmatron::
> 
>     "You didn't have to run." Magmatron said to Bazooka and 
Mantella. 
> "Bobertron isn't even here yet."
>     "Bobertron you must report to the Lab ASAP." Magmatron said 
into his 
> comm. "Since he isn't here yet we can start with you. You would 
like you keep 
> you beast mode, yes?" Magmatron said to Mantella. "Anyway all you 
have to do 
> is lie down in this chair and relax. The procedure might pinch a 
little."
>     "Bazooka, Bobertron has picked up a signal, go and greet it for 
me, and 
> Bazooka, remember to smile once and a while."
>     Bazooka put on a really fake simile and walked out side.
>     "Ready?" Magmatron said to Mantella.
